contents: 82 OVERLEAF NOTES WwW 12, Parties which accept this form for the purpose of preferential tariff under the ASEANKorea Free Trade Agreement (AKFTA) BRUNEI DARUSSALAM CAMBODIA INDONESIA REPUBLIC OF KOREA LAOS MALAYSIA MYANMAR PHILIPPINES SINGAPORE THAILAND VIETNAM CONDITIONS: To enjoy preferential tariff under the AKFTA, goods sent to any Parties listed above: qy must fall within a description of goods eligible for concessions in ths country of destination; iy must comply with the consignment conditions In accordance with Rule 9 of Annex 3 (Rules of Origin) of the AKFTA, and (lit) must comply with the origin criteria In Annex 3 (Rules of Origin) of the AKFTA. ORIGIN CRITERIA: For goods that meat the origin criteria, the exporter and/or producer must Indicate In box & of thls Form, the origin criteria met, in the manner shown In the following table: Clroums tances of production of marurtecasre in the firetoountry named in box 1 of this foern {8} Goods whotly obtained or produced in the \rrfory of the exporting Party {} Goody satistying RUS {c) Goods satistying the Product Specific Russ . Specsic Processes: Specise Processes | {0} Goods satistying Ruse 6 | Rute O | EACH ARTICLE MUST QUALIFY: It should be noted that all the goads in a consignment must qualify separately in thelr own right. This is of particular relevance when similar articles of different sizes or spare parts gre sent. DESCRIPTION OF GOODS: The description of goods must be sufficiently detailed to enable the goads to be identified by the Custome Officers examining them. Any trade mark shall also be specified. FREECNBOARD (FOB) VALUE: The FOB value in Box 9 shall be reflected only when the Regional Value Content criterion Js applied in determining the origin of goods. The CO (Form AK) issued to and from Cambodia and Myanmar shall reflect the FOB value, regardless of the origin criteria used, tor the next two (2) years upon the implementation of this new arrangement. HARMONIZED SYSTEM NUMBER: The Hamonized System number shall be that of the importing Party. EXPORTER: The tarm Exporter in box 11 may include the manufacturer ar the producer. FOR OFFICIAL USE: The Customs Authority of the importing Party must Indicate (Vv) in the relevant boxes In column 4 whether or not preferential tariff is accorded, THIRD COUNTRY INVOICING: [In cases where invotces are issued by a third country, the Third Country Invaicing box should be ticked () and such Informations name and county of the company issuing the invoice shail be indicated in box EXHIBITIONS: tn cases where goods are sent from the territory of the exporting Party for exhibition in another country and sold during or after the exhibition for importation into the territory of a Party, In accordance with Rule 20 of the Operational Certification Proceduras, the Exhibitions box should be ticked (V) and the name and address of the exhibition Indicated In box BACKTOBACK CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN: In cases of BacktoBack CO, In accordance with Rule 7 (2) of the Operatianal Certification Procedures, the BacktoBack. CO box should be ticked (Vv). www.jdih.kemen}feu.go.id
